---
title: "Solutions"
format: html
execute: 
  enabled: true
  cache: false
  freeze: false
listing:
  contents: # Make sure to update the rendered folders in _quarto.yml
    - '2025/*/*.qmd'
    - '2024/*/*.qmd'
    - '2023/*/*.qmd'
    - '2022/*/*.qmd'
  date-format: 'YYYY-DD'
  sort: "date desc"
  type: table
  table-striped: true
  table-hover: true
  fields: [date, title]
---
